entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High plus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending early this morning then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow over exposed areas early this morning. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 along parts of the coast this morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 near noon. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 8.
